title: Matchsafe, "Nice to Monte Carlo", late 19th century
markings: stamped on inside of box: G.A.S. followed by rectangular lozenge containing head in profile facing right.
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular box with hinged lid, enamel decoration on lid showing train ticket, Nice to Monte Carlo; on reverse, view of Monte Carlo perched above Mediteranian coast. Striker on front.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Nice to Monte Carlo", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Silver, enamel. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-255.
